title: Multi-Case-Based Professional Education Curriculum for Online Assessment Design

context.prior_knowledge: Competence in basic online education tools and foundational knowledge of assessment design
context.additional_context: Program enhancing the capacity to design and apply online assessment tools for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Explain systematic methods for integrating online assessment strategies into the curriculum.
Learners can design VR-based assessment simulations suitable for professional fields through multi-case analysis.
Learners can develop protocols for applying formative assessment-centered feedback systems in digital environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
